name: Scout Tools
author: René Staghøj Nielsen

sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin, unzip it and move the unzipped folder to the “wp-content/plugins” directory in your WordPress installation.
  2. In your admin panel, go to Plugins and you’ll find Scout Tools in the plugins section.
  3. Click on the ‘Activate’ button to use your new plugin right away.
  4. Insert one of these shortcodes to write with Morse or A-K code on your website

Morse =[morse id=”Your text here”]
A-K[ak id=”Your text here”]
sections.faq:
How do I get in on my side this morning
[morse id=”Your text here”]

What kind of character works
the entire Danish alphabet
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Insert A To K code into Scout Tools with own Shortcode
  • Add Screenshot Image to WP.org

1.0.1

  • Prepare Scout Tools for WP 5.2

1.0.0

  • First edition with GB language file also in Danish
sections.description: Scout Tools is a small tool that will make your scout work a little easier. Now you can write Morse on your website So you can do fun things.
